headline: Assessing Copart (CPRT) Valuation as Shares Slip 22% Year-to-Date
summary: Copart (CPRT) has seen its stock edge slightly lower over the past month, down around 9%, adding to weakness that has persisted into the past year. Investors are taking note as the shares attempt to stabilize, especially given Copart’s longer-term growth track record. See our latest analysis for Copart. After a steady climb in recent years, Copart’s momentum has cooled. Its share price slipped nearly 9% over the past month and is down more than 22% year-to-date. The 1-year total shareholder...
